alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern West Feliciana and central East Feliciana Parishes, southeastern Wilkinson and southwestern Amite Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 317 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Spillman, or 10 miles north of Jackson, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Centreville, Woodville, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield and Spillman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
